snippet: An aide to President Vladimir V. Putin, who announced this week that he and his wife were divorcing, denied rumors that the president was in a romantic relationship.
lead_paragraph: An aide to President Vladimir V. Putin, who announced this week that he and his wife were divorcing, denied rumors that the president was in a romantic relationship.

headline.seo: Putin Aide Denies Divorce Is Driven by a Relationship
headline.main: Putin Aide Denies Divorce Is Driven by a Relationship
headline.print_headline: Aide Denies Putin’s Divorce Is Over an Extramarital Affair
